summary: This document is an email chain from July 2022 between an FBI Special Agent and Jessica-Wind Abolafia of Sanctuary for Families, discussing draft documents (I-914 Supplement B) related to a victim's case. The communication involves reviewing and signing documents for a victim with a victimization period from approximately 2003 to 2018.

persons.name: Jessica-Wind Abolafia
persons.role: Director, Anti-Trafficking Initiative at Sanctuary for Families
persons.context: She is the sender of the email, providing draft documents (I-914 Supplement B) for review and signature related to a victim's case, and offers to discuss via phone.

persons.name: Erica
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who, along with Jessica, would be happy to join a call to answer questions regarding the draft documents.

connections.description: They work together at Sanctuary for Families' Anti-Trafficking Initiative and are both involved in preparing and discussing legal documents for a victim.

connections.person2: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office
connections.description: They are communicating via email regarding draft legal documents (I-914 Supplement B) for a victim case, with Jessica providing the drafts and the FBI agent reviewing them.

events.title: Period of Victimization
events.description: The document states the dates of victimization for a case are approximately 2003 to 2018.

events.title: Email with Draft Documents Sent
events.description: Jessica-Wind Abolafia sent an email with draft documents (I-914 Supplement B) for review and signature to the FBI.

events.title: Follow-up Email
events.description: An FBI Special Agent sends a follow-up email, attaching a draft letter and reiterating the victimization period (2003-2018) for the draft I-914 Supplement B.

keyFacts: The document is a 2022 email chain concerning the preparation of legal documents (I-914 Supplement B) for a victim in the Epstein case.
It specifies a victimization period spanning approximately 15 years, from 2003 to 2018.
The correspondence is between an FBI Special Agent from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking desk and a director from Sanctuary for Families, an organization aiding gender violence survivors.
The I-914 Supplement B is a form related to applications for T nonimmigrant status (victims of trafficking).
The email highlights ongoing legal and support procedures for victims years after the main Epstein investigations.
